definition: able to/so that sb can/enabling/in order to/finally in a position to/with sth in view
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)

sentences.english: This construction has survived the Crimean War and the WWII.
sentences.chinese: 這幢建築在克里米亞戰爭和二戰中得以倖存。

sentences.english: The dispute was settled by mediation of the third country.
sentences.chinese: 這場爭端通過第三國的斡旋而得以解決。

sentences.english: Village work to get to meet with siew, he put away the resolution dove.
sentences.chinese: 中村功得以脫身去與蕭船見面，他決議除掉白鴿。

sentences.english: Then the eye is relaxed for distance and the entire amount of focusing ability is available to see close.
sentences.chinese: 遠視的眼睛得以鬆弛，用全部調焦能力近看。

sentences.english: As a result, fewer of the plants are being pollinated and bearing fruit.
sentences.chinese: 因此，得以授粉並結果的植物越來越少。

sentences.english: What happened is that a group of Jihadists managed to infiltrate the town over night.
sentences.chinese: 一股聖戰組織成員在夜間得以滲入廷巴克圖。

sentences.english: Their position enabled them to usurp power.
sentences.chinese: 他們所處的地位使其得以篡權。

sentences.english: That the man of God may be complete, fully equipped for every good work.
sentences.chinese: 叫屬神的人得以完備，爲着各樣的善工，裝備齊全。

sentences.english: Now I, his coddled son, get to dick around on the Internet all day.
sentences.chinese: 現在，他溺愛的孫子，我，才得以網絡上混口飯喫。

sentences.english: Gains are realized when assets are liquidated to cash.
sentences.chinese: 當資產進行清算兌現後，收益得以實現。

sentences.english: Mr Sallah had only recently had earlier charges dropped against him, following public pressure.
sentences.chinese: 迫於公衆壓力，先前對他的指控最近才得以消除。

sentences.english: When the first paraglider appeared, People's dream came true.
sentences.chinese: 自從飛行傘出現後，人們的這一願望得以實現。

sentences.english: And that is how illusion and delusion vanishes .
sentences.chinese: 唯有放下，所有幻覺與假相才得以消失。

sentences.english: Sakyamuni was thus able to continue his journey.
sentences.chinese: 釋迦牟尼由此得以繼續行程。

sentences.english: He was bedridden for three weeks, but ultimately healed.
sentences.chinese: 隨後，傑克遜三週臥牀不起，但最終得以康復。

sentences.english: They rejoice in your name all day long; they exult in your righteousness.
sentences.chinese: 他們因你的名終日歡樂，因你的公義得以高舉。

definition: usable/workable/feasible/doable/to make/to cause
to make/to cause/to enable/to use/to employ/to send/to instruct sb to do sth/envoy/messenger
a moment ago/just now/(indicating sth happening later than expected)/(preceded by a clause of condition or reason) not until/(followed by a numerical clause) only
thus/thereby
to be saved from/to be spared (something)
to be capable of/to be able to/can
to yield/to permit/to let sb do sth/to have sb do sth/to make sb (feel sad etc)/by (indicates the agent in a passive clause, like 被[bei4])
until
cannot/to fail to/unable to
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
talent/ability/capacity
hard to (predict, imagine etc)
by means of/through/via/to pass through/to get through/to adopt/to pass (a bill or inspection etc)/to switch over
therefore/as a result/thus/and as a result, ...
to get/to obtain/to receive
in order to/hoping to/attempting to/waiting for
